param_input_item.param_description: m-by-n-by-3 numeric array: Truecolor image, defined as an m-by-n-by-3 numeric array. For images of data type double, the values must be within the range [0, 1].
m-by-n matrix of integers: Indexed image (double or uint8)

c-by-3 numeric matrix: Colormap linked to the indexed image X, defined as a c-by-3 numeric matrix with values ranging from [0, 1]. Each row of the matrix represents an RGB triplet, specifying the red, green, and blue components of a colormap color.

param_output_item.param_description: a structure: Movie frame with two fields: cdata and colormap.

description.p: F = im2frame(RGB) converts the truecolor image RGB into a movie frame F.
F = im2frame(X, map) converts the indexed image X along with its colormap map into a movie frame F.
F = im2frame(X) converts the indexed image X into a movie frame F, using the current colormap.
